level.heading: Election or appointment of officers; required security.
level.text: There shall be a president, a secretary, and a treasurer of the company, who shall be elected by the directors; and also such subordinate officers as may be elected or appointed, and who may be required to give security for the faithful performance of the duties of their office, as this subdivision and the company by its bylaws may require.
